devdoc.details: This implementation combines the gas savings of having no function selectors found in 0age's implementation: https://github.com/dharma-eng/dharma-smart-wallet/blob/master/contracts/proxies/smart-wallet/UpgradeBeaconProxyV1.sol With the added niceties of a safety check that each implementation is a contract and an Upgrade event emitted each time the implementation is changed found in OpenZeppelin's implementation: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/master/contracts/proxy/beacon/BeaconProxy.sol

params._controller: Address of the controller who can upgrade the implementation
params._initialImplementation: Address of the initial implementation contract

devdoc.title: UpgradeBeacon

constructor.notice: Validate the initial implementation and store it. Store the controller immutably.

userdoc.notice: Stores the address of an implementation contract and allows a controller to upgrade the implementation address
